name: @saekitominaga/customelements-button-clipboard
description: Clipboard write text button by Custom Elements.
author: Saeki Tominaga

scripts._build:compress: onchange -f add -f change -v dist/ButtonClipboard.js -- brotlin compress dist/ButtonClipboard.js -m 1
scripts._build:minify: onchange -f add -f change -v dist/ButtonClipboard.js -- terser dist/ButtonClipboard.js -o dist/ButtonClipboard.min.js -c ecma=2020 --mangle --ecma 2020 --module --source-map content='dist/ButtonClipboard.js.map',filename='ButtonClipboard.js',includeSources,url='ButtonClipboard.min.js.map'
scripts._build:minify-compress: onchange -f add -f change -v dist/ButtonClipboard.min.js -- brotlin compress dist/ButtonClipboard.min.js -m 1
scripts._build:minify-declaration: onchange -f add -f change -v dist/ButtonClipboard.d.ts -- cpy dist/ButtonClipboard.d.ts dist --rename=ButtonClipboard.min.d.ts
